title: Should I upgrade ram to 8gb or 12gb? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you put in another ram stick. ie 4+4 or 4+8gb the system will be able to access the memory via two channels instead of one and this will improve the performance significantly. Your integrated Graphics will get a 30 to 40% fps boost and overall things will be a lot smoother. I would recommend you to upgrade your ram to 8gb,
Dealer said the right thing. You dont need much more RAM. 8GB is quite enough. More RAM doesn't really help much until you actually use that much
